content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-0.5, -9.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam engine (position -0.5, -9.5)
- Boiler (position -4.5, 23.0)
- Offshore pump (position -10.5, 25.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position 0, 0) and a furnace at position(0, 0)
- Burner mining drill (position 5, 5) and a furnace at position(5, 5)

### Copper cable factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine at position(z1) and inserter at position(a) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position) that connects the furnace at position y1 to assembling machine at position(z1)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to connection issues
- Ensure that the offshore pump is connected to a fluid source before attempting to connect it to the boiler and steam engine.
- Check for any placement blockages that may prevent pipes from connecting. Clear any obstructing entities or pipes before attempting to connect.

### Errors when using electric networks
- Make sure that all entities requiring power are connected to the electric network. Verify the positions of electric poles and ensure they are within range of the entities needing power.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity in a tile before attempting to place it. Check for existing entities in the target tile that may block placement.
